sentences.sContent: Since earliest times, mankind has been fascinated by fire.
sentences.sCn: 人类自远古以来就对火很感兴趣。

sentences.sContent: one of the most important events in the history of mankind
sentences.sCn: 人类历史上最重要的事件之一

remMethod.val: man(人) ＋ kind(种类， 性质) → 人类

trans.tranOther: all humans considered as a group
